response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it is worth more than its face value of $1,000,000 to you. Considering its significance to your operations, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to purchase it at a special introductory price of $950,000. This offer is designed to provide you with a substantial saving while securing your position with a high-quality asset. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or finalizing the transaction.", "product_price": 950000}
